rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: The human case found in Australia is of the same H5N1 strain that has spread rapidly around the world but the ones detected on the farms in Victoria are of the different H7N3 strain.

rationale: The segment uses an intensifier ('rapidly') modifying a moderate verb ('spread'), not a direct impact noun.
statement_text: The human case found in Australia is of the same H5N1 strain that has spread rapidly around the world but the ones detected on the farms in Victoria are of the different H7N3 strain.
